sub_topic: Probability of drawing a certain card from a deck of cards
message_1: What is the probability of drawing a King of Hearts from a standard deck of 52 cards?
message_2:
There is only one King of Hearts in a standard deck of 52 cards. Therefore, the probability of drawing a King of Hearts is 1 out of 52, which can be written as a fraction:

1/52

or as a decimal:

0.01923

or as a percentage:

1.923%
